alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Pickaway; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHERN FAIRFIELD, NORTH CENTRAL PICKAWAY, DELAWARE, WESTERN LICKING AND NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from near Prospect to Powell to Groveport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Pickerington, Worthington, Bexley, Pataskala, Powell, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Johnstown, Sunbury, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Ashley and Minerva Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 99 and 127. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 104 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Pickaway; Union
